CustomField.description: The name of level 0 parent for this Taxonomy record.
CustomField.formula: IF (NOT(ISBLANK( Parent_Id__r.Parent_Id__r.Parent_Id__c)), Parent_Id__r.Parent_Id__r.Parent_Id__r.Name, IF (NOT(ISBLANK( Parent_Id__r.Parent_Id__c)), Parent_Id__r.Parent_Id__r.Name, IF (NOT(ISBLANK( Parent_Id__c)), Parent_Id__r.Name, "")))
CustomField.label: ParentLevel0Name
